spx.sc.net

Class Heartbeat

  • java.lang.Object
    • spx.sc.net.Heartbeat

  • public class Heartbeat
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for containing heartbeat messages received on the network.

    This class is kept in sync with the SPxScNetHeartbeatStruct structure defined in "SPxScNet.h".

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int appId
      ID of server.
      long clientAddr
      Address of connected client (0 if none).
      short health
      Health of server.
      int listeningPort
      Port that the server accepts connections on.
      long magic
      Magic number.
      static long MAGIC
      Magic number for heartbeats.
      short numChannels
      Number of channels, sources, screens, etc.
      int processId
      Last two bytes of the application's process ID.
      int sourceStatus
      Source status information.
      short sourceType
      Source type.
      short state
      State of server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Heartbeat()
      Creates a Heartbeat object with default values.

      Creates a Heartbeat object, setting the member fields from a byte array.
      Heartbeat(java.nio.ByteBuffer byteBuf)
      Creates a Heartbeat object, setting the member fields from a byte buffer.

    • Field Detail

      • MAGIC

        public static final long MAGIC
        Magic number for heartbeats.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • magic

        public long magic
        Magic number.

        This should always be equal to MAGIC in a valid heartbeat.

        See Also:
        MAGIC

      • appId

        public int appId
        ID of server.

        A bitwise combination of constants from HeartbeatID.

        See Also:
        HeartbeatID

      • health

        public short health
        Health of server.

        A bitwise combination of SystemHealthBit constants.

        See Also:
        SystemHealthBit

      • state

        public short state
        State of server.

        A bitwise combination of constants from HeartbeatState.

        See Also:
        HeartbeatState

      • clientAddr

        public long clientAddr
        Address of connected client (0 if none).

      • listeningPort

        public int listeningPort
        Port that the server accepts connections on.

      • sourceStatus

        public int sourceStatus
        Source status information.

        A bitwise combination of SystemHealthSrc constants and a source-specific value in the bottom byte.

        See Also:
        SystemHealthSrc

      • sourceType

        public short sourceType
        Source type.

        A value from the SourceType interface.

        See Also:
        SourceType

      • numChannels

        public short numChannels
        Number of channels, sources, screens, etc.

      • processId

        public int processId
        Last two bytes of the application's process ID.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Heartbeat

        public Heartbeat()
        Creates a Heartbeat object with default values.

      • Heartbeat

        public Heartbeat(byte[] buffer)
        Creates a Heartbeat object, setting the member fields from a byte array.
        Parameters:
        buffer - Byte array containing heartbeat in network byte order.

      • Heartbeat

        public Heartbeat(java.nio.ByteBuffer byteBuf)
        Creates a Heartbeat object, setting the member fields from a byte buffer.
        Parameters:
        byteBuf - Byte buffer containing heartbeat.
